import { createUseGesture, dragAction, pinchAction } from '@use-gesture/react';

sourcesContent:
import { createUseGesture, dragAction, pinchAction } from '@use-gesture/react';
export const useDragAndPinch = createUseGesture([dragAction, pinchAction]);
